english.segment1: I'm going away for a while. But I'll be back, don't try and follow me. 'Cause I'll return as soon as possible. See I'm trying to find my place. But it might not be here where I feel safe. We all learn to make mistakes
english.segment2: And run. From them, from them. With no direction. We'll run from them, from them. With no conviction
english.segment3: 'Cause I'm just one of those ghosts. Traveling endlessly. Don't need no road. In fact they follow me
english.segment4: And we just go in circles
english.segment5: Well Now I'm told that this is life. And pain is just a simple compromise. So we can get what we want out of it. Would someone care to classify, A broken heart and twisted minds. So I can find someone to rely on
english.segment6: And run. To them, to them. Full speed ahead. Oh you are not, Useless. We are just
english.segment7: Misguided ghosts. Traveling endlessly. The ones we trusted the most. Pushed us far away. And there's no one road. We should not be the same. But I'm just a ghost. And still they echo me
